name: Planets [Tumblr dash theme]
description: Theme for your Tumblr dashboard, with custom 'new post' icons. "A solar system refers to a star and all the objects that travel in orbit around it. Our solar system consists of the sun - our star - eight planets and their natural satellites (such as our moon); dwarf planets; asteroids and comets. Our solar system is located in an outward spiral of the Milky Way galaxy." †
